name: Bridge Tunnel Client
description: Connects to the bridge server running on a Vercel Sandbox to forward inbound requests to local applications and intercept outbound traffic via iptables.

sandboxUrl.description: URL of the bridge server running on the Vercel Sandbox (e.g., https://sandbox-abc123.vercel.run)

functionUrl.description: URL of the dispatcher function (required for tunnel registration)

sandboxName.description: Name for the sandbox (used for SSH config alias)

syncTarget.description: Remote directory on sandbox to sync to

appPort.description: Local app port to forward inbound requests to

bridgeVersion.description: Version of bridge CLI to install (e.g., 'v1.0.0' or 'edge')

envFile.description: Path to env file containing VERCEL_AUTOMATION_BYPASS_SECRET (relative to workspace)

workspacePath.description: Container workspace folder path â€” pass ${containerWorkspaceFolder} from devcontainer.json

forwardDomains.description: Comma-separated list of domain patterns to intercept and resolve through the tunnel (e.g., '*.vercel.app,example.com')
